title: LOGAN SQUARE - LARGE SUNNY - STUDIO - HEATED - DICKENS AND SAWYER
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
LARGE STUDIO - Near DICKENS and SAWYER - 2nd Flr - $975 - JULY 15 - AUGUST 1 MOVE IN (Possibly may have ready sooner)
Logan Square - Hardwood Floors Very Bright Apt - Cats
OK - No Dogs - Laundry and Bike Storage in the Building - Dishwasher Available(Additional) -
NO MOVE IN FEE - NO DEPOSIT - NO APPLICATION FEE
Credit should be in the mid 700's (720+).
Income will need to be verifiable and meet threshold per your living situation.
Savings of 4K+ for EACH ADULT greatly preferred.
Any adults authorized to occupy the unit may be required to have background check.
Very reputable Mom and Pop Landlord with Long term tenants and many tenants referred by existing and past tenants.
PLEASE CALL 1-708-571-5396 (We DO NOT check EMAIL regularly)
PLEASE CALL to get more information, provide us with your qualifications and to set up a showing.
